publicwhip.spmotion: *S3M-3643 Karen Whitefield: Greengairs Primary School Permanent Eco-School Status—That the Parliament congratulates the staff and pupils of Greengairs Primary School on obtaining permanent Eco-School status, which follows the award of a fourth Green Flag; recognises the hard work carried out by staff and pupils, both past and present, to achieve this award, and values the role of the Eco-Schools awards in raising the awareness of children about environmental and conservation issues.
S3M-3643 Greengairs Primary School Permanent Eco-School Status (lodged on 9 March 2009) Jamie Hepburn*

S3M-3643 Karen Whitefield: Greengairs Primary School Permanent Eco-School Status—That the Parliament congratulates the staff and pupils of Greengairs Primary School on obtaining permanent Eco-School status, which follows the award of a fourth Green Flag; recognises the hard work carried out by staff and pupils, both past and present, to achieve this award, and values the role of the Eco-Schools awards in raising the awareness of children about environmental and conservation issues. Supported by: Jamie Hepburn, Jack McConnell*
S3M-3643 Greengairs Primary School Permanent Eco-School Status (lodged on 9 March 2009) David Stewart*
S3M-3643 Greengairs Primary School Permanent Eco-School Status (lodged on 9 March 2009) Des McNulty*

S3M-3643 Greengairs Primary School Permanent Eco-School Status (lodged on 9 March 2009) Paul Martin*, James Kelly*, Patricia Ferguson*, Hugh Henry*, Charlie Gordon*, David Whitton*, Bill Butler*, Jamie McGrigor*, Gil Paterson*, Helen Eadie*, Elaine Murray*, Angela Constance*, Sandra White*, Elaine Smith*, Trish Godman*, Robin Harper*, Mary Mulligan*, Bill Kidd*, Cathie Craigie*
S3M-3643 Greengairs Primary School Permanent Eco-School Status (lodged on 9 March 2009) Ken Macintosh*
S3M-3643 Greengairs Primary School Permanent Eco-School Status (lodged on 9 March 2009) Marilyn Livingstone*
S3M-3643 Greengairs Primary School Permanent Eco-School Status (lodged on 9 March 2009) Stuart McMillan*
